brand.tagline: The automated command center for ambitious TikTok Shop creators.

hero.title: Scale Your TikTok Shop
hero.subtitle: From Chaos to Command
hero.description: The only fulfillment automation platform built for viral TikTok creators.
hero.subdescription: Transform 50 orders into 500+ without breaking a sweat.

benefits.title: Automate Operations. Amplify Revenue.
benefits.description: CreatorFlow isn't just a tool—it's a measurable competitive advantage. See the real-world impact on your bottom line.

automationSavings.title: Automation Savings
automationSavings.description: Save an average of $27,000/month in operational costs with a fully automated order and shipping workflow.

inventoryAccuracy.title: Inventory Accuracy
inventoryAccuracy.description: Prevent $8,400/month in costly oversells with real-time, sub-5-second inventory tracking.

processingSpeed.title: Processing Speed
processingSpeed.description: Reduce order import times from 12 minutes down to 30 seconds.

showcase.title: The Data Weave.
showcase.subtitle: Where TikTok Shop data threads are woven into a tapestry of command.

analytics.title: TikTok Shop Analytics
analytics.description: Real-time CreatorFlow performance metrics and trends

testimonials.title: What Creators Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join the creators who turned chaos into command. Their success is our foundation.

quotes.viral_creator: CreatorFlow didn't just organize my business, it unlocked a new level of growth I never thought possible.
quotes.ecom_queen: The automation saved me over 40 hours a week. It's like having a full-time operations manager.
quotes.tiktok_hustler: Inventory syncing is flawless. I haven't oversold a single item since switching.
quotes.gadget_guru: My order processing went from 15 minutes to literally 15 seconds. Game changer.
quotes.style_sensei: The CEO dashboard gives me the clarity to make real, data-driven decisions. My revenue is up 40%.
quotes.crafty_creator: I can finally focus on creating, not logistics. CreatorFlow handles everything.

cta.title: Ready to Scale Your TikTok Shop?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of creators who've transformed chaos into command
cta.description: Start your 14-day free trial and see why CreatorFlow is the #1 choice for viral TikTok creators.

FP010FeatureHero.title: Transform Your TikTok Shop Into an Automation Powerhouse
FP010FeatureHero.subtitle: Complete Feature Suite
FP010FeatureHero.description: Every tool you need to scale from chaos to command. Built specifically for viral TikTok creators who refuse to let logistics limit their growth.

FPOrderManagement.title: One Stream. Total Control.
FPOrderManagement.subtitle: CreatorFlow unifies every order into a singular, intelligent pipeline. Hover over a capability to see its direct impact.

orderAutomation.title: Real-Time Order Processing
orderAutomation.description: Automatically import, process, and route orders from TikTok Shop in under 30 seconds. No manual data entry, no delays.

shippingIntelligence.title: Intelligent Shipping Optimization
shippingIntelligence.description: Compare rates across UPS, FedEx, and USPS instantly. Generate labels in bulk. Track everything automatically.

analyticsDashboard.title: Creator Performance Analytics
analyticsDashboard.description: Real-time insights into your TikTok Shop performance. Track viral content impact on sales, identify trends, optimize inventory.

tiktokIntegration.title: Seamless TikTok Shop Sync
tiktokIntegration.description: Native integration with TikTok Shop API. Real-time inventory sync, automatic product updates, zero overselling.

scalingTools.title: Enterprise Scaling Tools
scalingTools.description: Bulk operations, workflow automation, team management. Scale from 50 to 5,000+ orders without adding overhead.

inventoryManagement.title: Smart Inventory Control
inventoryManagement.description: Predictive inventory alerts, automatic reorder points, multi-location sync. Never run out of stock during viral moments.

FP010FeatureComparison.title: CreatorFlow vs. Generic Solutions
FP010FeatureComparison.subtitle: Built for TikTok creators, not generic e-commerce
